name: Fisheye (Phibian)
description:
Be the strongest clan of tadpoles in Fisheye: an arcade-y roguelike shooter where you're as much a danger to yourself as your enemies!

Be careful shooting too many bubbles, because after two bounces, they can hit you! In this action-packed title, you can expect: 

  • Juicy sound effects and adaptive music
  • 9 unique upgrade abilities that modify gameplay (4 unlockable)
  • 7 unique enemies to face in different scenarios and spawning groups
  • Lots of hidden mechanics to explore

Made in 10 days for the MashUp 2022 Game Jam.
